results.title: Metformin, Rapamycin, or Nicotinamide Mononucleotide Pretreatment Attenuate Cognitive Impairment After Cerebral Hypoperfusion by Inhibiting Microglial Phagocytosis

results.title: Metformin ameliorates the proinflammatory state in patients with carotid artery atherosclerosis through sirtuin 1 induction.

results.title: Sustained influence of metformin therapy on circulating glucagon-like peptide-1 levels in individuals with and without type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: AIMS: To investigate, in the @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002340 @@@Carotid Atherosclerosis@@@: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ for @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@Insulin Resistance@@@ (CAMERA) trial (NCT00723307), whether the influence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the @GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@glucagon-like peptide (GLP)-1@@@ axis in individuals with and without @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ (T2DM) is sustained and related to changes in glycaemia or weight, and to investigate basal and post-meal @GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@GLP-1@@@ levels in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with T2DM in the cross-sectional @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes@@@ Research on @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patient@@@ Stratification (DIRECT) study.

citations.NLM: Preiss D, Dawed A, Welsh P, Heggie A, Jones AG, Dekker J, Koivula R, Hansen TH, Stewart C, Holman RR, Franks PW, Walker M, Pearson ER, Sattar N, DIRECT consortium group. Sustained influence of metformin therapy on circulating glucagon-like peptide-1 levels in individuals with and without type 2 diabetes. Diabetes Obes Metab. 2017 Mar;19(3):356-363. PMID: 27862873
